mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(reply_no, post_no, user_no, email, reply_content) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{post_no}, #{user_no}, #{email}, #{reply_content})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply_content = #{reply_content}, modDate = sysdate where reply_no = #{reply_no}
mapper.select: select count(reply_no) from tbl_reply where post_no = #{post_no}
